Quels sont les noms autorisés sur notre: What names are allowed on our app?
Notre application: Our app is a community in which each user uses the name they use every day. This way, anyone can know the identity of their interlocutor.
Votre nom peut inclure: Your name can include all the elements (symbols, numbers ...)
de préférence: But preferably can not include in your name:
Des titres: - Titles of any kind (for example, professional, religious)
Des mots: - Words or phrases instead of a name
